Services

NDIS Behaviour Support Services

This page outlines my practice focus in behaviour support for NDIS participants and provider teams. Behaviour Support Practitioner application submitted and pending. Service delivery arrangements are discussed with providers consistent with applicable NDIS requirements.

Registration status: Behaviour Support Practitioner application submitted and pending. Services are provided consistent with applicable NDIS requirements and standards.

Core service areas

  • Information gathering and structured intake with the support network
  • Functional behaviour assessment support (under supervision)
  • Behaviour Support Plan (BSP) development and review (as applicable)
  • Implementation support, coaching, and consistency planning
  • Behaviour-related risk identification and safety considerations

Who this is for

  • NDIS registered providers
  • Support coordinators
  • Plan managers
  • Multidisciplinary teams supporting NDIS participants

A concise professional profile outlining my experience, qualifications, and practice approach is available for provider reference.
